import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import logo from "../Assets/logo.png" import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import "./Navbar.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../../context/ShopContext' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setmenu]=useState('') const {getTotalCartItem}=useContext(ShopContext) return (

Shoppers

  • {setmenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setmenu("women")}}>Women{menu==="women"?
    :<>}
  • {setmenu("men")}}>Men{menu==="men"?
    :<>}
  • {setmenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu==="kids"?
    :<>}
{getTotalCartItem()}
) } export default Navbar
